QuestData.Title: Into the Wilds
QuestData.Description: Deep in the wilds rests the Temple of the Red Crane, home of the great Chi-Ji and his most devout followers. I suspect they'll know something about what happened here.$B$BThe temple is located on the southern coast of the wilds, where the Krasarang River meets the sea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Koro Mistwalker near the Temple of the Red Crane at the southern end of Krasarang River.
